title: Implement DatabaseMetaDataImpl.getDatabaseMajorVersion and DatabaseMetaDataImpl.getDatabaseMinorVersion()
description: DBVisualizer asks the driver for information about database major/minor version. There is a warning if debug logging is turned on in DBVisualizer. This information is also displayed in the driver manager page if available.

comments.author: Kevin Risden

2016-01-07 13:30:10.845 FINE    83 [pool-3-thread-10 - E.ￄﾁ] RootConnection: DatabaseMetaDataImpl.getDatabaseMinorVersion()

comments.author: Kevin Risden
comments.content: Requires SOLR-8503 to be merged first.
